DocumentationDefinitionList.Title: Predefined groups in OpenCms
DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Predefinied groups in OpenCms and their pecularities

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: All members of the administrators group are automatically root administrators.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Whenever you assign a role to a user, he is added to the users group. If you remove the role, he will also loose his group membership (even if you explicitely added him to the group before). Typically, all users should be in the users group. For example, the rights to read view and write content in the default site is granted to members of the Users group. The same holds for the /shared/ folder.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Guest and Export user are in this group. It is in particular used for all users that do not log in.
